data: Quando arriva, il grande amore travolge tutto quello che incontra. Alexander è un uomo con un’infanzia difficile alle spalle, finalmente felice con sua moglie e la loro bambina. Laura è una gallerista d’arte in procinto di sposarsi. Quando si incontrano a una festa, capiscono al primo sguardo che non avranno scampo. Ma la vita sembra avere altri piani per loro. Tra scelte che non riusciranno a compiere e un destino ripetutamente beffardo, attraverseranno tutta la loro esistenza tormentati da un sentimento che li divora. Perché un amore mai vissuto è un amore che non potrà mai morire. (When it comes, great love overwhelms everything it encounters. Alexander is a man with a difficult childhood behind him, finally happy with his wife and their child. Laura is an art dealer about to get married. When they meet at a party, they realise at first sight that they will not have a chance. But life seems to have other plans for them. Between choices they will not be able to make and a fate that is repeatedly mocking, they will go through their entire existence tormented by a feeling that devours them. Because a love that has never lived is a love that can never die.)

When it comes, great love overwhelms everything it encounters. Alexander is a man with a difficult childhood behind him, finally happy with his wife and their child. Laura is an art dealer about to get married. When they meet at a party, they realise at first sight that they will not have a chance. But life seems to have other plans for them.
